issue.title: [CF 118] parent & anchor frames for bars
issue.body:
I'd like to be able to make bars relative to other frames in my UI.  That means being able to set the parent frame, anchor frame, anchor point, relative point, and offsets in X & Y.  Similar functionality can be seen in addons like KGPanels & Shadowed Unit Frames.

Why?   In my case, I have my raid frames (from SUF) set at the bottom of my screen.  When they are not present, I'd like for my TMW bars to be much lower on my screen; basically where the raid frames are located.  When I join a raid, I'd like to see them get pushed up so that they don't overlap the raid frames.


> Posted by CurseForge user Vardelm | Imported from CurseForge issue #118 | Raw
